Education.Degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering

Projects.Title: Job Portal Website
Description: Developed a full-featured Job Portal App with the MERN stack, including user authentication as Job Seeker and Job Provider.
Implemented RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.js for efficient handling of user data, company data, job data, etc.
Developed front-end components using React, ensuring a dynamic and interactive user experience.

Projects.Title: A website for local restaurant to order food
Description: A frontend responsive project made for local restaurant.
Capable of checking availability of fast food at local restaurant.
User can give feedback based on experience.

Projects.Title: Fake News Detection System
Description: Developed a machine learning-based system to identify and classify fake news articles to combat misinformation.
Collected and cleaned a large dataset of news articles.
Extracted features such as TF-IDF and word embeddings.
Built and trained models like logistic regression and neural networks.
Addressed imbalanced datasets, improved NLP skills, and gained deployment experience.
